name: 'One Hundred Years Of Solitude' Online Trivia | Literature | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the last name of the family in the book?
questions.explanation:
Buendia.

	Gabriel Garcia Marquez started writing "One Hundred Years of Solitude" in 1965 and it took him eighteen months to complete it. The book was based on ways his grandmother would tell wild stories.

questions.text: What was the name of Jose Arcadio's wife?
questions.explanation:
Ursula.

	Ursula was between one hundred fifteen and one hundred twenty when she passed away the morning of Good Friday. It was hot the day she was buried so not many people came to her funeral.

questions.text: What title did Aureliano give himself?
questions.explanation:
Colonel.

	Aureliano is Jose and Ursula's second son. He joined a liberal army and gave himself the title of Colonel. At the time of Aureliano's death, he had seventeen sons by seventeen different women. Each one of the sons had his first name.

	Amaranta was in love with Pietro Crespi, an Italian musician. He did not return her love right away. When he finally fell in love with Amaranta, she turned him down and he killed himself.

questions.text: What was the name of the orphan girl that Ursula and Jose adopted?
questions.explanation:
Rebeca.

	Rebeca married Jose Arcadio II, the son of Ursula and Jose. After Jose Arcadio II died, Rebeca secluded herself until her death.

questions.text: What did Amaranta do to her hand after Pietro's death?
questions.explanation:
Burned it.

	Amaranta burnt her hand in the stove after Pietro's death as a sign of regret for turning down his love. She wore a black bandage around the burned hand until her death.

questions.correct: The most beautiful woman in the world
options: The ugliest woman in the world
The woman that was switched at birth
questions.explanation:
The most beautiful woman in the world.

	Remedios was the daughter of Santa Sofia de la Piedad and Jose Arcadio Segundo III. She was the most beautiful woman in the world. Men died over her. One afternoon, without warning, Remedios ascended into Heaven.

questions.text: What was the name of the only biological daughter of Ursula and Jose Arcadio?
questions.explanation:
Amaranta.

	Amaranta never married even though she was in love with Pietro Crespi and Colonel Gerineldo Marquez. Her brother Colonel Aureliano Jose I was in love with her.

questions.text: What language did Aureliano II discover the family prophecies were written in?
questions.explanation:
Sanskrit.

	Aureliano II found prophecies that were written in Sanskrit by a gypsy named Melquiades. The prophecies told of what would happen to everyone in the town of Macondo.

questions.text: The last of the family line was a boy.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The last of the family line was a boy named Aureliano. He was the son of Amaranta Ursula and Aureliano II. The baby, Aureliano III, was born out of incest and had the tail of a pig when he was born. Amaranta Ursula died in childbirth and the baby died later that day.
